summary: This document is a text message from an individual to 'Leon' requesting a copy of an NDA they were forced to sign. The sender accuses Leon of sexual harassment, sex trafficking, rape, blacklisting, and forcing them to sign the document under duress, indicating an ongoing, harmful connection.

persons.name: Leon
persons.context: The recipient of a text message who is accused by the sender of sexual harassment, sex trafficking, rape, blacklisting, and forcing the sender to sign an NDA under duress.

connections.description: The unnamed sender accuses Leon of sexually harassing, sex trafficking, raping, and blacklisting them, and forcing them to sign an NDA under duress.

events.title: Text Message Request for NDA
events.description: An individual sends a text message to Leon requesting a copy of an NDA they were forced to sign under duress, while also detailing serious allegations against him.

keyFacts: An individual accuses a person named Leon of sexual harassment, sex trafficking, rape, and blacklisting.
The individual states they were forced to sign an NDA under duress and were unable to read it before signing.
The individual indicates they are still tied to Leon, suggesting an ongoing coercive or dependent relationship.
The communication is a direct, contemporaneous record of an alleged victim confronting their accused perpetrator.
